findings.message: Test guidance hardcodes merchant assertion to `expect.stringContaining("peter")`; this is brittle if `MERCHANT_NOTIFY_EMAIL` differs in CI/runtime. Assert against a deterministic test value (set `process.env.MERCHANT_NOTIFY_EMAIL` in test) instead of name-specific matching. Resolved: updated test guidance to set env var in beforeEach/afterEach.

The `escHtml` note claims coverage for attribute-value context, but the helper does not escape `'`; current snippet is safe for text-node interpolation, so wording should be narrowed. Resolved: narrowed wording to text-node context.
Validation criteria mention TypeScript build only; repo gate policy expects lint alongside typecheck. Resolved: added lint to acceptance criteria.
